name: LUNAR LICH/月球巫妖
description:
"Lunar Lich" uses the traditional rpg horror decryption method to bring players an end-game experience.
To explore the gloomy forests, underground ruins, and dangerous mansion, and open the only way by solving a variety of puzzles.

Features

·Various and profound level design, presenting players a continuous sense of novelty
·Without delay, the protagonist who has never suffered a kidney diesease flexibly avoids various traps, and the dense levels make the player unable to stop
·The sense of direction for solving puzzles is clear, no need to fear the darkness
·The underground world extends in many directions, without losing the beauty of winding paths and powerful exploration drive
·Exciting high-quality boss fights, not to escape, but to conquer fear
·Marvelous plot
·The horror effect is ingenious and appropriate, after the chill, only joy and happiness are left
·Unbelievable sound design, dark and depressing horror atmosphere
·Happy ending, good people will finally get a good end
·And more
